front.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE Internatiional Standard - Information technology--Portable Operating System Interface (POSIX(R)) -- Part 2: Shell and Utilities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard is part of the POSIXÂ¨ series of standards for applications and user interfaces to open systems. It defines the applications interface to a shell command language and a set of utility programs for complex manipulation. When the User Portability Utilities Option is included, the standard also defines a common environment for general-purpose time-sharing users on character-oriented display terminals.
